snippet: President Sebastián Piñera apologized for serious mistakes in the nationwide census last year, which, despite intense efforts, failed to survey over 9 percent of the population.
abstract: Chile's Pres Sebastian Pinera apologizes for serious mistakes in nationwide census in 2012, which, despite intense efforts, failed to survey over 9 percent of the population.
lead_paragraph: President Sebastián Piñera apologized for serious mistakes in the nationwide census last year, which, despite intense efforts, failed to survey over 9 percent of the population.
